name: Raid Arena
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en:
Raid Arena (RAID) is a competition market platform built on the Solana that gamifies community engagement through timed onchain battles. The platform introduces a new category of “competition markets” that allows token communities to compete head to head in timed contests that convert attention and participation into measurable trading volume, mindshare, and engagement.

Launched in 2025, Raid Arena was created to solve a recurring challenge in the Web3 ecosystem. Many projects struggle to maintain consistent community engagement and trading activity after launch. The platform provides a transparent mechanism for communities to rally around their token while driving onchain volume and awareness.

Each battle pits two or more tokens against one another. Participants deposit into a shared prize pool and engage in coordinated social and trading activity over a fixed time period. When the timer ends, the token with the best performance in terms of percent change wins the pool. This model transforms passive token holding into an interactive event that rewards coordination and enthusiasm.

The platform is designed for simplicity and inclusivity. Any verified Solana project can register a token to compete, and users can participate directly from their wallets without intermediaries. The underlying smart contracts automate deposits, result calculation, and payouts, ensuring fairness and transparency throughout the process.

Raid Arena’s economic model aligns incentives between token communities and liquidity providers. Fees collected from competitions are redistributed to participants and platform operations, creating a circular system where community activity generates real yield.

The project operates with a community-first philosophy. Instead of relying on venture funding, Raid Arena emphasizes open participation and transparent development. 
Raid Arena also explores the cultural side of crypto. Inspired by the competitive spirit of ancient arenas, the platform merges social media dynamics, DeFi mechanics, and gamified design into one interface. This approach allows communities to express identity, compete for recognition, and measure collective strength through verifiable onchain outcomes.

The team’s roadmap includes multi-chain support, new competition formats, and integration with Solana analytics partners for verified data feeds. Future updates will allow creators to host sponsored Raids, giving brands and DAOs the ability to direct incentives toward engagement or liquidity events.

By combining entertainment, community coordination, and measurable trading metrics, Raid Arena bridges the gap between speculation and participation. Its focus on timed, transparent, and reward-driven competitions offers a new way for crypto communities to prove strength through real onchain performance.
